list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group of (typically three or more) notes sounded together, as a basis of harmony.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hợp âm mở kịch chiến thắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a straight line joining the ends of an arc.
each of the two principal members of a truss.
a string on a harp or other instrument.
play, sing, or arrange notes in chords.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the entire swing session is masterfully chorded by the Duke on piano
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Toàn bộ phiên swing được hợp âm hoàn toàn bởi Duke trên Piano
